document.full_text: world all-around gymnastics champion aliya mustafina will not defend her title at this year's championships after tearing knee ligaments, russia's national team coach said on saturday.
document.title: russia's aliya mustafina to miss worlds with knee injury
lines_and_colors: world all-around gymnastics champion aliya mustafina will not defend her title at this year's championships after tearing knee ligaments, russia's national team coach said on saturday.
